title: 8 stats that stand out from Bruins’ encouraging start to 2025-26 season
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins Only three skaters on the Bruins' roster have yet to record a point through the team's first four games.
Marco Sturm's club is 3-1-0 to start the season.
(Ken McGagh for The Boston Globe) By Conor Ryan October 15, 2025 | 12:01 AM 6 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: New Bedford woman, 70, dies days after being rescued from burning home
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News The cause of the fire is under investigation, but it does not appear to be suspicious, the department said.
A 70-year-old woman died days after being rescued from the third floor of a burning home in New Bedford Oct.
9, officials announced Tuesday.

title: Trump threatens to ‘take away’ World Cup games scheduled for Boston area
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Sports News The president said Tuesday he would consider moving the seven World Cup games scheduled for the Boston area elsewhere.
President Donald Trump said Tuesday he would consider moving the World Cup games scheduled for the Boston area elsewhere due to "unsafe conditions.

" Jacquelyn Martin/AP Photo In response to a recent string of so-called street takeovers, President Donald Trump said Tuesday that he could “take away” the 2026 World Cup games scheduled to be held in the Boston area.

title: Report: Alex Bregman to opt out of Red Sox contract, hit free agency
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox Bregman will reportedly be searching for a longer — and more lucrative — contract on the open market.
Alex Bregman will reportedly hit free agency this winter.
Photo by Ishika Samant/Getty Images If the Red Sox want to keep Alex Bregman in a Boston jersey beyond the 2025 season, they’re reportedly going to have to dole out another hefty new contract.

title: Joe Mazzulla and the Celtics coaches beat our media team by 53 points, and it was an absolute blast
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics It was media vs.
the Celtics coaches at the Auerbach center, and the game went about how you would expect.
Joe Mazzulla Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Patriots writer maps out potential trade targets, including Alvin Kamara
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "Relative to what Stevenson should be able to do, he's about 50, 60, 65% of himself.
" Alvin Kamara would be a versatile weapon in New England's offense.

title: Pressley condemns ‘rogue’ ICE agents’ arrest of Everett boy, 13
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News “He is a 7th-grader who should have been met with compassion and care, not criminalized and sent to an adult prison,” Congresswoman Ayanna Pressley said.
Congresswoman Ayanna Pressley.
John Tlumacki/The Boston Globe Congresswoman Ayanna Pressley sharply condemned the “alarming” detainment of a 13-year-old Everett boy by U.

title: DA: Man arrested for murder of Worcester woman who disappeared in 2009
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The 36-year-old Worcester woman was never seen again after her disappearance, and her murder went unsolved until last month.
A Mississippi man was arrested for the murder of a Worcester woman who disappeared 16 years ago, prosecutors announced Friday.
Albert Carabba, 64, of Ocean Springs, Miss.

title: Joe Mazzulla explained why he talks about fighting so much
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics “Everybody is fighting something whether they’re willing to admit it or not.
" Boston Celtics head coach Joe Mazzulla speaks at a news conference during the NBA basketball team's media day, Monday, Sept.
29, 2025, in Boston.

title: My car’s dashboard lit up like a pinball machine
author: John Paul
bullets: How To John Paul, AAA Northeast's Car Doctor, answers a question from a reader whose dash was suddenly filled with system error alerts.
The Car Doctor answers a question from a reader whose dash was suddenly filled with system error alerts.
